EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jane, Thanks so much for the response, I would love to reconnect with you. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I look forward to speaking with you again – enjoy the holiday! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Jane Meyer [mailto:janemeyer685@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, August 28, 2013 5:45 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Jane Meyer Sara, Thanks for checking in. I was able to pick-up several consulting assignments that are keeping me busy. I will wrap-up a couple of assignments in the next two weeks. I would like to reconnect if you are open to talking about my path forward. The best time for me is next week after Tuesday. Is there a good day and time that works for you. Thanks,Jane From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: janemeyer685@yahoo.com <mailto:janemeyer685@yahoo.com> Sent: Wednesday, August 28, 2013 4:42 PM Subject: MBO Partners / Jane Meyer Hello Jane,As a courtesy I wanted to follow up with you to see how the contract search was going.Any update would be great,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028f: 703-793-6070e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/trk?t=2&mid=Njg4LU5QTS01MjU6MDoxNzQ0OjIyNDU6MDoxMjMyOjc6MTQ5NjE1MC0xOm51bGw%3D&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUrWKK2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsFgI%2BSLDwEYGJlv6SgFTLjNMa5w17gIWRQ%3D>
